mapper.sql: select mno, id, pwd , name, email, tel , photo, pst_no, address ,bas_addr, gender, age, introduce
mapper.select:
from member order by
id name
mno
asc desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into member( id, pwd , name, email, tel , photo, pst_no, address ,bas_addr, gender, age, introduce ) values(#{id},sha1(#{pwd}),#{name},#{email},#{tel},#{photo}, #{pst_no},#{address},#{bas_addr},#{gender},#{age},#{introduce})
mapper.delete: delete from member where id=#{id} and pwd=sha1(#{pwd})
mapper.select: from member where id=#{id} and pwd=sha1(#{pwd})
